COVID-19 Tier Restrictions Current COVID-19 Tier hospitality restrictions are putting particular pressure on our little village pub due to its limited availability of dining tables. In an attempt to attain viable trade, balanced with customer safety regulations, we have been forced to implement the following provisional dining-in terms: Booking It is strongly advised that you pre-books tables, especially on Friday evening, Saturday evening and the Sunday Lunch services. Booking terms & conditions will be explained at the time of booking.

COVID-19 Tier Restrictions Christmas Day and New Years Eve Current COVID-19 Tier hospitality restrictions are putting particular pressure on our little village pub due to its limited availability of dining tables. In an attempt to attain viable trade, balanced with customer safety regulations, we have been forced to implement the following provisional dining-in terms: Sittings From 5.00pm must be booked for either food or drinks; tables are bookable in two-hour slots with the main food services operating two sittings.
